page.title: 03Mr.Punter's Day
page.content: Woken by our alarm clock,I get up wash,shave,dress and go downstairs.We have a noisy family breakfast and it's off to work (usually on my motorbike) at the{university. I open up my workshop,switch on the electricity and check the post.I start my main work of repairing our department equipment.Soon it's lunch break-a quiet sit down maybe a trip to town to buy something. After lunch I go to the colliery where some of our equipment has failed.When I return I prepare for the next day's work-maybe a survey at sea. 17.00,it's time to go home.After a lively tea I will probably carry on with our home improvements.Tired,I sit down to watch the Nine o'Clock News, have supper and then talk to my wife before going to bed,exhausted.
